DOC.brief_summary: The 2 × 2 crossover design study evaluate bioequivalence two different liposomal amphotericin B injection single IV infusion dose normal healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: An Bioequivalence Study Compare Two 2 mg/ml Liposomal Amphotericin B Injections Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subjects must adults ( > 20 year old ) good health basis medical history , physical examination , electrocardiogram , chest Xray , routine laboratory evaluation . 2 . A plan take concomitant medication enrol study , exception acetaminophen ( 2 g/day ) vitamins . 3 .
